orig_text: For example, a node which performs only routing functions would have a value of 4 (2^(3-1)).
correct_text: For example, a node which performs only routing functions would have a value of 4 (2^(4-1)).
notes:
Typo in the example formula.
 --VERIFIER NOTES-- 
The formula in the original document is correct. The "3" in the calculation refers to the OSI layer that routing functions occur at.
